zh.Io.index.945942-1: 将告警数据输出到其他第三方系统
zh.Io.index.945942-5: 接收第三方系统处理的告警结果
zh.Io.index.945942-8: 1、平台支持将告警数据输出到kafka，第三方系统可订阅kafka中的告警数据，进行业务处理。
zh.Io.index.945942-11: 2、平台支持订阅kafka中告警处理数据，并更新告警记录状态。
zh.Io.index.945942-21: 告警记录的唯一标识，可根据此ID处理告警
zh.Io.index.945942-23: 告警所属的业务类型，具体有产品、设备、部门、其他
zh.Io.index.945942-33: 触发告警的源类型。当前只有device
zh.Io.index.945942-37: 触发告警的源名称。如设备名称
zh.Io.index.945942-46: 告警处理时间，不填是默认为消息处理时间
zh.Io.index.945942-48: 告警处理内容详细描述说明
zh.Io.index.945942-49: 已联系第三方人员进行告警处理，现告警已恢复

en.Io.index.945942-1: Output alarm data to other third-party systems
en.Io.index.945942-5: Receive alarm results processed by third-party systems
en.Io.index.945942-8: 1. The platform supports outputting alarm data to Kafka, and third-party systems can subscribe to the alarm data in Kafka for business processing.
en.Io.index.945942-11: 2. The platform supports subscribing to alarm processing data in Kafka and updating alarm record status.
en.Io.index.945942-14: Alarm configuration name for push notifications
en.Io.index.945942-17: Alarm configuration ID for push notifications
en.Io.index.945942-21: The unique identifier for alarm records, which can be used to process alarms based on this ID
en.Io.index.945942-23: The business type to which the alarm belongs specifically includes product, equipment, department, and others
en.Io.index.945942-33: The type of source that triggers the alarm. Currently, there are only devices available
en.Io.index.945942-35: The source ID that triggered the alarm. Like device ID
en.Io.index.945942-37: The name of the source that triggered the alarm. Such as device name
en.Io.index.945942-43: Unified alarm rules for smoke detectors on the first floor
en.Io.index.945942-46: Alarm processing time, if left blank, defaults to message processing time
en.Io.index.945942-48: Detailed description and explanation of alarm handling content
en.Io.index.945942-49: Third party personnel have been contacted for alarm handling, and the alarm has now been restored
en.Io.index.945942-59: The device temperature is too high
